name: simplefolio
description: A clean, beautiful and responsive portfolio template for Developers!

scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve dist
scripts.build: npm run build:parcel && npm run build:blog && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.copyFileSync('src/robots.txt','dist/robots.txt');fs.copyFileSync('src/sitemap.xml','dist/sitemap.xml');fs.copyFileSync('src/llms.txt','dist/llms.txt');fs.copyFileSync('src/llms-full.txt','dist/llms-full.txt');fs.mkdirSync('dist/.well-known',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync('src/.well-known/security.txt','dist/.well-known/security.txt')"

author: Juan Idrovo
